message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $120 to you, and we're confident it will meet all your needs. We're looking to maximize our earnings, so we're offering it to you for $110. Please let us know if this works for you!

Thanks for the offer, Alice.  I appreciate you trying to work with me.  However, $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product. Let me know if that's something we can work with.
Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your position, and we're willing to negotiate further. We're proposing to sell the product to you for $105. We hope this offer meets your expectations.
